import React, { Component } from "react"; import API from "../utils/API"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class GitBash extends Component { state = { gitInfo: [] }; componentDidMount() { API.getAll("git") .then(res => { console.log("ajax data: ", res); this.setState({ gitInfo: res.data }); }) .catch(error => { console.log("error: ", error); }); } render() { return (

What is GitBash

" Git for Windows focuses on offering a lightweight, native set of tools that bring the full feature set of the Git SCM to Windows while providing appropriate user interfaces for experienced Git users and novices alike.Git for Windows
